00006 #pragma once
00007 #include <boost/tuple/tuple.hpp>
00008 
00009 typedef boost::tuple<int, double, double, double> ToolingTuple; 
00010 
00011 typedef float Real;       
00012 typedef Real Point2d [2];        /* 2d point */
00013 typedef Real Point3d [3];        /* 3d point */
00014 typedef Real Point4d [4];
00015 typedef unsigned short ushort;
00016 /* 2d line */
00017 struct Line2D
00018 {
00019   Point2d e1;                  /* The first endpoint */
00020   Point2d e2;                  /* The second endpoint */
00021 } ;                   
00022 
00023 /* 3d line */
00024 struct  Line3D
00025 {
00026   Point3d e1;                  /* The first endpoint */
00027   Point3d e2;                  /* The second endpoint */
00028 } ; 
00029 
00030 /* 2d arc */
00031 struct Arc2D
00032 {
00033   Point2d c;                   /* Arc center */
00034   Real r;                   /* Arc radius */
00035   Real sa;                  /* Start angle in radians */
00036   Real sw;                  /* Sweep angle in radians */
00037 } ;                   
00038 
00039 /* 3d arc */
00040 struct Arc3D
00041 {
00042   Point3d ep1, ep2;    /* Arc endpoints */
00043   Point3d c;           /* Arc center, relative to view */
00044   Real r;           /* Arc radius */
00045   Real sa;          /* Start angle in radians */
00046   Real sw;          /* Sweep angle in radians */
00047 } ;           
00048 
00049 
00050 /* 
00051 Parametric spline      
00052 spline sp;
00053 alloc_spline_data_ptr (&sp);
00054 if (sp.c_ptr != NULL && 
00055 (sp.data_ptr_index == 0 || sp.data_ptr_index == 1))
00056 mprintf ("PASS\n");
00057 */
00058 struct  ParametricSpline
00059 {
00060   Point3d e1, e2;    /* The endpoints */
00061   Real t1;        /* The t parameter corresponding to e1 */
00062   Real t2;        /* The t parameter corresponding to e2 */
00063   Real max_curv;  /* Maximum curvature */
00064   short n_segs;   /* Number of segments */
00065   byte ord;       /* The order of the polynomial */
00066   byte dim;       /* The dimension: 2 for 2d, 3 for 3d */
00067   //byte dummy;     /* A filler */
00068   boolean closed; /* True if spline is closed (endpoints are equal) */
00069   //byte pad[2];    /* pad entity to 8 bytes */
00070   //eptr_type ent_ptr; /* The entity pointer */
00071   //long pad1;      /* Filler */
00072   //byte pad2;      /* Filler */
00073   //boolean ram;    /* True if entity stored in RAM */
00074 
00075   short data_ptr_index; /* The data pointer index  */ 
00076   Real *c_ptr;    /* The coefficient pointer */
00077 } ;           
00078 
00079 /* NURBS curve */
00080 struct NURBS        
00081 {
00082   Point3d e1, e2;        /* endpoints */
00083   Real t1, t2, maxc;  /* beg, end parameters, max curvature */
00084   Real normal[3];     /* if planar, normal to plane of curve */
00085   short nk;           /* number of knots */
00086   short np;           /* number of control points */
00087   byte deg;           /* degree */
00088   byte dim;           /* dimension, includes weight in rational case */
00089   struct
00090   {
00091     ushort planar   :1;    /* Set to 1 if planar */
00092     ushort closed   :1;    /* Set to 1 if closed */
00093     ushort non_rat  :1;    /* Set to 1 if non-rational */
00094     ushort periodic :1;    /* Set to 1 if periodic */
00095     ushort uniform  :1;    /* Set to 1 if uniform */
00096     ushort filler   :11;   /* Filler */
00097   } flags;
00098 
00099   Real *k_ptr;        /* points to knots array */
00100   Real *cp_ptr;       /* points to control points array */
00101   //eptr_type ent_ptr;  /* Used if entity overflows to disk */
00102   //short data_ptr_index; /* Used if entity overflows to disk */
00103   //boolean ram;        /* Used if entity overflows to disk */
00104   //byte pad;           /* Filler */
00105 } ;
00106 
00107 
00108 class MillingProcess
00109 {
00110 public:
00111 
00112   double LookupSfm(CString szToolMaterial, CString szPartMaterial) { return 0; }
00113   double ComputeSpindleSpeed(double sfm, double diameter)
00114   {
00115     _rpm = (12.0 * sfm)/( 3.1415926535 * diameter);
00116     return _rpm;
00117   }
00118   double ComputeFeedrate(double spindlespeed /* rpm */, double feedpertooth /*length/tooth*/, int nTeeth)
00119   {
00120     _feed = spindlespeed /*rpm*/ * feedpertooth * (double) nTeeth;
00121     return _feed; // length/min  e.g., mm/min or in/min
00122   }
00123   double CuttingSpeed(double inchDiameter)  
00124   {
00125 
00126   }
00127   //double CuttingSpeed(double mmDiameter)
00128   //{
00129 
00130   //}
00131   // Qd - Volume of metal remove - input mm units or inch units work  in^3/min
00132   double RateOfMetalRemoval(double dWidthCut, double dDepthCut,  double feed) 
00133   {
00134     double Qm = dWidthCut * dDepthCut * feed; 
00135     return Qm;
00136   }
00137 
00138   // return hp given: k metal constant, E is efficiency (around .7-.85) 
00139   double Horsepower(double k, double Qd, double E) { return (k *Qd )/ E; }
00140 
00141   // return hps - hp = 33,000 ftlb/min = 550 ft lb /sec
00142   double SpindleTorque(double hp, double rpm /* part rpm*/) { double hps = 550 * hp / 33000; return (63030 * hps )/ rpm; }
00143 
00144 
00145   // drilling, milling, turning
00146   typedef boost::tuple<double, double, double> KHorsepowerTuple; 
00147   std::map<CString, KHorsepowerTuple> _kHorsepowerlist;
00148 
00149   void InitKHorsepower()
00150   {
00151     //_toollist.push_back("Mild Steel 25RC", ToolingTuple(1.0, 1.0, .9));
00152     //_toollist.push_back("Mild Steel 30RC", ToolingTuple(1.6, 1.8, 1.3));
00153     //_toollist.push_back("Mild Steel 50RC", ToolingTuple(1.9, 2.1, 1.5));
00154     //_toollist.push_back("Soft Cast Iron", ToolingTuple(.8, .7, .5));
00155     //_toollist.push_back("Hard Cast Iron", ToolingTuple(.9, 1.1, 1.0));
00156     //_toollist.push_back("Aluminum", ToolingTuple(.35, .4, .3));
00157     //_toollist.push_back("Brass", ToolingTuple(.5, .6, .4));
00158     //_toollist.push_back("Bronze", ToolingTuple(.6, .8, .7));
00159     //_toollist.push_back("Stainless 400", ToolingTuple(1.3, 1.3, 1.1));
00160     //_toollist.push_back("Stainless 300", ToolingTuple(1.6, 1.8, 1.7));
00161     //_toollist.push_back("Titanium", ToolingTuple(1.0, 1.0, 1.1));
00162     //_toollist.push_back("Nickel Alloys", ToolingTuple(1.6, 1.6, 1.5));
00163   }
00164   double _rpm;
00165   double _feed;
00166 };
